description: Manage work items associated with pull requests.

commands.name: az repos pr work-item add
commands.summary: Link one or more work items to a pull request.
commands.syntax:
az repos pr work-item add --id
                          --work-items
                          [--detect {false, true}]
                          [--org]

commands.name: az repos pr work-item list
commands.summary: List linked work items for a pull request.
commands.syntax:
az repos pr work-item list --id
                           [--detect {false, true}]
                           [--org]

commands.name: az repos pr work-item remove
commands.summary: Unlink one or more work items from a pull request.
commands.syntax:
az repos pr work-item remove --id
                             --work-items
                             [--detect {false, true}]
                             [--org]
